meanings.definition: A symbol or representation of a quality or concept.
meanings.sent1: The heart shape is an emblem of love.
meanings.sent2: The national flag is an emblem of patriotism.
meanings.sent3: The emblem of a smiling sun on the weather forecast made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was an emblem that shone brightly in the community.
meanings.sent5: The emblem of a dove carrying an olive branch symbolizes peace.

meanings.definition: A badge or design representing an organization or country.
meanings.sent1: The company logo serves as an emblem of its brand.
meanings.sent2: The eagle emblem on the uniform signifies military rank.
meanings.sent3: The emblem on his cap was so big, it looked like a flying saucer.
meanings.sent4: The emblem of the lion on the shield showed strength and courage.
meanings.sent5: The emblem of the maple leaf is a proud symbol of Canada.
